description: This Java class defines a custom configuration for Feign clients within a Spring application. It extends the default FeignClientConfiguration, overriding the ErrorDecoder bean to use a custom error decoder implementation.

classes.name: CustomFeignClientConfiguration
classes.description: A Spring configuration class that customizes Feign client behavior, specifically by providing a custom error decoder.

methods.name: errorDecoder
methods.description: Defines a Bean that supplies a custom ErrorDecoder implementation for Feign clients.
